name: project-list
description: Easy access and switching between projects with options

project-list.description: Provides access to the project list manager

recent-list.description: Provides access to the recent projects list manager

useCache.title: Use cached data
useCache.description: Dump the project list to a cache file. Useful if scanning is used.

checkExists.title: Existing items only
checkExists.description: Add an item to the list only if at least one of its paths exists.

parseTitleTags.title: Parse [tags] in titles
parseTitleTags.description: Parse and style [tag] patterns in project titles as tag elements.

windowTitle.title: Modify window title
windowTitle.description: If the list of open folders matches the project paths, modify the window title.
